body.name: david's kids 4 Piece Toddler Bedding Set - Soft Breathable Toddler Bedding Set for Boys Girls, Includes Quilted Comforter, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet and Pillowcase, Rainbow
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 17 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Our toddler bedding set is made from premium eco-friendly, skin-friendly Microfiber polyester fabric, offering exceptional softness and comfort, suitable for all seasons. We are committed to creating a cozy and secure sleep environment for your lovely kids, ensuring they get a good night's sleep all year round.

david's kids toddler bedding sets are carefully designed with professional color schemes and trendy patterns that are popular in the baby product industry. Our collection includes classic designs like dinosaurs, cars, rainbows, princesses, and space, all adored by kids. You can always choose a bedding set that matches their preferences from our wide range of options.

Package Include: 1 comforter (42x57inch), 1 pillowcase (20" x 30"), 1 flat sheet (45" x 60") and 1 fitted sheet (28" x 52" ). Our 4-piece toddler bedding set is specifically designed to fit standard American crib/toddler mattress sizes. We pay careful attention to every detail to provide the utmost quality for your kids.

Easy Care: Designed to meet the needs of your kids, our toddler bedding set is machine washable. Slow speed circulation, low temperature drying or flat drying. Please avoid using bleach. The delicate pattern will remain vibrant after multiple washes. Our rigorous manufacturing process guarantees that the bedding set is resilient and can withstand frequent washings without incurring any damage. Our toddler bedding set is a dependable choice for your child.

Perfect Gift Idea: Our toddler bedding set packaged in an exquisite box is a great gift choice for baby shower, christening, birthday party, or newborn. They are the ultimate timeless gift anytime that will be enjoyed for years to come. They will accompany your child's growth and make your child love their bedroom.

Product Introduction Ultra Soft & Skin- Friendly Our toddler bedding set is made from skin-friendly fabric, Warm in autumn and winter, not hot in summer, suitable for all seasons. Durable Elastic Stretch Band The crib sheets are designed with an elastic band. It is firm and durable, making it more convenient for you to change and wash. Rigorous craftsmanship With meticulous sewing process, our products have outstanding durability and high quality standards, we provide you with only the best products. Adorable Pattern Our toddler bedding set is designed through professional colour schemes, these patterns are sure to add a nice touch to your children’s bedding room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute set! Wrinkles easily.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter as a christmas gift and the comforter is perfect for a toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable bedding set for little girls!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the david's kids 4 piece toddler bedding set for my 2 year old daughter. She recently got her big girl bed so I've been looking for bedding for her. This set is absolutely beautiful and is princess themed. When I got it put on my daughters she was so excited and wanted to get in the bed right away. The bedding seems to be well made, soft, and I'm guessing comfortable for her cause she sleeps just fine with the bedding on her bed. It also looks great on her pink Minnie mouse bed! I would definitely recommend this bedding set for little girls! It is so adorable!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but okay
reviews.reviewText: Very thin material but seems soft and will probably hold up over time. We also use a small blanket in conjunction to keep baby warm. Nice, cute but a tad too thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This set is for a toddler bed. I use it for my son’s car bed (which is a twin) and it works pretty well for decor purposes. He loves it. The colors are vibrant and the design is interesting. It’s comfortable and thick and fluffy. It’s not the softest but it’s lightweight and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set for the spaceship lover in your favor
reviews.reviewText: Got this set for my 5 year old son who lives space ships. The package comes in a vacuum sealed package which ends up being great for shipping.The comforter is a typical synthetic comforter but the perfect size for a toddler bed.Overall, this product is great for medium temperatures and higher (60+ degrees) and you'd probably want to supplement the comforter with something warmer on colder nights.Pro:Machine washablePerfect fit in our two toddler mattressesGreat printCon:Comforter is a little on the light side but usableI did set it up prior to washing to take pictures. After washing, the set looks the same but without the creases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and was better than expected
reviews.reviewText: My son has outgrown his baby blanket and needed a new bed set for his converted crib bed. He's into vehicles right now so this set is perfect. The blanket is big enough that it will cover the entire standard crib mattress and the pillow will fit a regular adult pillow which he isn't using yet but we may upgrade that next. The material is softer than I expected, it has a big of that soft sleeping bag or puffy jacket feel to it. I think that it will be good for our area (SF bay area). The colors are very nice and bright and the print is very clean as well. I'm very happy with this bed set and would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin blanket, and rough material for the baby.
reviews.reviewText: This set has awesome pattern on it and comes with an assortment of different of bedding. I like the patterns however that is about it. The material is too rough for my baby's skin. Also the thread used on the stitching is very badly executed. I would not recommend this product for a toddler, adult maybe, but not toddler. For adults this is way to small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality bedding set
reviews.reviewText: - My toddler is all about space at the moment so i ordered this bedding set for his crib. The fabric is soft and looks comfortable. The comforter is fluffy and warm. The color is beautiful very similar to pictures listed on the product page. This set washes well and there is no shrinkage or color bleeding. My only complaint is that my toddler's mattress is 6 inch thick and there is not enough fabric in the fitted sheet to go under his crib. It lays just at the edge.- Overall this is a nice quality set and my toddler loves this.
